AboutMe.title: Who I am
AboutMe.text: Hello! I'm Igor Rocha, a fullstack developer with five years of experience. My passion for technology has led me to web development, where I create a variety of digital products. On the front end, I use React.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Sass, and Vite or Next.js. With Apollo Client and GraphQL, I build dynamic and efficient interfaces, prioritizing usability. On the backend, I rely on Node.js and NestJS, combined with PostgreSQL, TypeORM, or Prisma to ensure secure data storage. I master Docker for app portability and consistency. I develop everything from websites and blogs to e-commerce sites, email marketing, dashboards, and internal systems, offering ongoing maintenance and support. For code quality, I use Jest and Vitest for automated testing, ensuring product stability and reliability. I'm ready to turn your ideas into digital reality!

text: Development and maintenance of pages in Wordpress or Vtex for Phooto.
Development and maintenance of E-mail Marketing.
Development of codes for landing page changes according to parameters received.
Development of e-commerce on the VTEX platform for Katmandu, Vivenda do camarão, Caído Pneus using HTML5, SCSS, Javascript, jQuery.
Development of new features and code refactoring.
Process automation using Postman Collection Runner.
Development and maintenance of websites with Wordpress for São Cristóvão, Saesp and Bardal.
Performance improvement following best practices pointed by Google Pagespeed.
Development of e-commerce on the VTEX platform for Rihappy.com.br using HTML5, SCSS, Javascript, jQuery, Gulp, Babel, Node.js, Webpack, React, Typescript and Graphql.
Development of new features and code refactoring.
Process automation using Postman Collection Runner and Node.js.
Feature testing, merge and deploy to production.
